column4: can someone help me out real quick? i have a macbook pro 2010. I triple booted it. Its got mac OS X snow leopard, Windows 7, and Unbuntu 11.10. windows 7 worked fine, untill i installed Unbuntu 11.10. now when i select to boot in wndows 7; it takes me to a black screen with a blinking "_" on the upper left hand corner.
where did you install the boot loader?
grub ; but the question is where did you install it
